---

title: "Get the information of a submitted Utilities Payment"
description: "Use this endpoint in order to require the information of a submitted Utilities Payment by passing the payments digitable line."

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Get the information of a submitted Utilities Payment"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/payment/payment-slip/utilities/{digitableLine}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Use this endpoint in order to require the information of a submitted Utilities Payment by passing the payments digitable line.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"digitableLine","description":"Identification digitable line of the slip.","schema":{"type":"string"},"in":"path","required":true}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
